h1_title: Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough
content: Around the halfway mark of this second phase, things get even more complicated. The Stone Monkey will reach for a hair and perform his own version of the Pluck of Many spell. He'll split in two, with two health bars appearing on screen. When this happens, you'll now experience both fire and ice at the same time, with each monkey alternating between the two elements.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Water_Curtain_Cave_and_Birthstone_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Birthstone - Heart of Birthstone' and the sub-subsection 'Stone Monkey Phase Two'.
The content is as follows:
Around the halfway mark of this second phase, things get even more complicated. The Stone Monkey will reach for a hair and perform his own version of the Pluck of Many spell. He'll split in two, with two health bars appearing on screen. When this happens, you'll now experience both fire and ice at the same time, with each monkey alternating between the two elements.
